Trade/Device Name(s): Dimension Vista™M Ethyl Alcohol (ALC) Flex® reagent cartridge
Dimension Vista™M Alkaline phosphatase (ALP) Flex® reagent cartridge
Dimension Vista™M Calcium (CA) Flex® reagent cartridge
Dimension Vista™M Lactic Acid (LA) Flex® reagent cartridge
Dimension Vista™M Lithium (LI) Flex® reagent cartridge
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Dimension Vista™M Flex® reagent cartridges for alcohol, alkaline phosphatase, calcium, lactic acid, and lithium assays for use on the Dimension Vista™ Integrated system
Indications for Use Summary: In vitro diagnostic reagent cartridges for quantitative measurement of ethyl alcohol (serum), alkaline phosphatase (serum, plasma), calcium (serum, plasma, urine), lactic acid (plasma), and lithium (serum, plasma) to aid diagnosis and treatment in respective clinical conditions
